languages.text: {n}Как бы вы ни крутили бобины и не жали на кнопки, все ваши усилия тщетны: приборная панель плывет у вас перед глазами, а в разводах на экране вам начинаются чудиться буквы, которе вот-вот сложатся во внятные слова...{/n}

{n}No matter how many reels you spin or how many buttons you push, all of the efforts remain futile: the control panel sways before your eyes, and the swirls on the screen start resembling letters on the cusp of forming coherent words...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Как бы вы ни крутили бобины и не жали на кнопки, все ваши усилия тщетны: приборная панель плывет у вас перед глазами, а в разводах на экране вам начинаются чудиться буквы, которе вот-вот сложатся во внятные слова...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}No matter how many reels you spin or how many buttons you push, all of the efforts remain futile: the control panel sways before your eyes, and the swirls on the screen start resembling letters that are about to form coherent words...{/n}

{n}No matter how many reels you spin or how many buttons you push, all of the efforts remain futile: the control panel sways before your eyes, and the swirls on the screen start resembling letters that are about to form coherent words...{/n}

{n}No matter how many reels you spin or how many buttons you push, all of the efforts remain futile: the control panel sways before your eyes, and the swirls on the screen start resembling letters on the cusp of forming coherent words...{/n}

{n}No matter how many reels you spin or how many buttons you push, all of the efforts remain futile: the control panel sways before your eyes, and the swirls on the screen start resembling letters on the cusp of forming coherent words...{/n}

{n}No matter how many reels you spin or how many buttons you push, all of the efforts remain futile: the control panel sways before your eyes, and the swirls on the screen start resembling letters on the cusp of forming coherent words...{/n}

languages.text: {n}无论你如何试着转动控制面板上的转盘，敲击上面的按钮，这一切努力都徒劳无功。控制面板在你眼前不断晃动，屏幕上的文字漩涡似乎连在了一起，形成了连贯的文字……{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}No matter how many reels you spin or how many buttons you push, all of the efforts remain futile: the control panel sways before your eyes, and the swirls on the screen start resembling letters on the cusp of forming coherent words...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}无论你如何试着转动控制面板上的转盘，敲击上面的按钮，这一切努力都徒劳无功。控制面板在你眼前不断晃动，屏幕上的文字漩涡似乎连在了一起，形成了连贯的文字……{/n}

languages.text: {n}Da igual cuántos rodillos gires y qué botones pulses, el efecto es el mismo: el panel de control se balancea ante tus ojos y las espirales de la pantalla empiezan a parecer letras que podrían llegar a formar palabras inteligibles...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}No matter how many reels you spin or how many buttons you push, all of the efforts remain futile: the control panel sways before your eyes, and the swirls on the screen start resembling letters on the cusp of forming coherent words...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Da igual cuántos rodillos gires y qué botones pulses, el efecto es el mismo: el panel de control se balancea ante tus ojos y las espirales de la pantalla empiezan a parecer letras que podrían llegar a formar palabras inteligibles...{/n}

languages.text: {n}どれだけリールを回したりボタンを押したりしても、何をしてもどうにもならない。コントロールパネルは目の前で揺れており、画面に映る渦巻き模様が、何か意味のある言葉になろうとしている文字であるかのように見えてきた…{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}No matter how many reels you spin or how many buttons you push, all of the efforts remain futile: the control panel sways before your eyes, and the swirls on the screen start resembling letters on the cusp of forming coherent words...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}どれだけリールを回したりボタンを押したりしても、何をしてもどうにもならない。コントロールパネルは目の前で揺れており、画面に映る渦巻き模様が、何か意味のある言葉になろうとしている文字であるかのように見えてきた…{/n}

languages.text: {n}Wie viele Räder du auch drehst und wie viele Tasten du auch drückst, alle Bemühungen bleiben fruchtlos: Das Bedienfeld schwankt vor deinen Augen, und die Wirbel auf dem Bildschirm erinnern zunehmend an Buchstaben, die kurz davor stehen, verständliche Wörter zu bilden ...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}No matter how many reels you spin or how many buttons you push, all of the efforts remain futile: the control panel sways before your eyes, and the swirls on the screen start resembling letters on the cusp of forming coherent words...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Wie viele Räder du auch drehst und wie viele Tasten du auch drückst, alle Bemühungen bleiben fruchtlos: Das Bedienfeld schwankt vor deinen Augen, und die Wirbel auf dem Bildschirm erinnern zunehmend an Buchstaben, die kurz davor stehen, verständliche Wörter zu bilden ...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous avez beau tout essayer, appuyer sur tous les boutons, faire pivoter toutes les manettes, rien n'y fait : le panneau de contrôle ondule sous vos yeux tandis que des formes s'agitent à l'écran, comme à deux doigts de former des mots cohérents...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}No matter how many reels you spin or how many buttons you push, all of the efforts remain futile: the control panel sways before your eyes, and the swirls on the screen start resembling letters on the cusp of forming coherent words...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous avez beau tout essayer, appuyer sur tous les boutons, faire pivoter toutes les manettes, rien n'y fait : le panneau de contrôle ondule sous vos yeux tandis que des formes s'agitent à l'écran, comme à deux doigts de former des mots cohérents...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Elini attığın gibi tüm kolları çevirip düğmelere bassan da çaban nafile. Kontrol paneli gözlerinin önünde sallanıyor, ekrandaki sarmallar ise yan yana gelince anlamlı kelimeler oluşturacak gibi harfleri andırmaya başlıyor...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}No matter how many reels you spin or how many buttons you push, all of the efforts remain futile: the control panel sways before your eyes, and the swirls on the screen start resembling letters on the cusp of forming coherent words...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Elini attığın gibi tüm kolları çevirip düğmelere basıyorsun ancak çaban nafile. Kontrol paneli gözlerinin önünde sallanıyor, ekrandaki sarmallar ise anlamlı kelimeler oluşturacak gibi harfleri andırmaya başlıyor…{/n}
